title: Fall Protection Awareness
description: Reviewed OSHA 1926 Subpart M requirements for fall protection above 6 feet. Demonstrated proper harness fit and lanyard inspection. Covered anchor point selection and rescue planning.
notes: All framing and roofing crew attended. Distributed new harness inspection pocket cards.

title: Excavation and Trenching Safety
description: Covered soil classification and protective systems. Reviewed sloping and shoring requirements for utility trenches. Demonstrated how to identify cave-in warning signs.
notes: Foundation crew and utility contractors attended. Reviewed competent person responsibilities.

title: Electrical Safety on the Jobsite
description: Discussed lockout/tagout procedures and energized work permits. Covered GFCI requirements for temporary power. Reviewed recent shock incident and lessons learned.
notes: All trades attended following electrical incident. Reinforced LOTO procedures.

title: Scaffolding Erection and Use
description: Reviewed scaffold assembly requirements including base plates and mud sills. Covered guardrail and access requirements. Discussed load capacity limits and plank inspection.
notes: Interior finishing crews attended. Demonstrated proper scaffold tagging system.

title: Heat Illness Prevention
description: Covered recognition of heat exhaustion and heat stroke symptoms. Reviewed company hydration policy and shade requirements. Discussed acclimatization schedule for new workers.
notes: Mandatory for all field personnel. Distributed electrolyte packets and water bottle refill schedule.

title: Crane and Rigging Safety
description: Reviewed hand signals and communication protocols for crane operations. Covered sling angle factors and load weight estimation. Discussed swing radius barricading requirements.
notes: All workers in crane operation zones attended. Posted updated crane signal chart in job trailer.
